General.Name: Digihost Technology Inc
General.Description: Digi Power X Inc. operates as a blockchain technology company in the United States and Canada. The company operates through Cryptocurrency Mining, Sales of Energy, and Colocation Services segments. It also mines for cryptocurrency; and supplies energy from power plants. The company was formerly known as Delta 9 Cannabis Inc. and changed its name to Digihost Technology Inc. in March 2025. Digi Power X Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 2830 Produce Row, Houston, TX, United States, 77023
